label: Description
value: Square sampler comprised of rectangular and square compartments containing circular motifs. Some circles are embellished with blue, green, dark yellow or red thread.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen, silk Technique: embroidery including needle knotting called tenerife

label: Description
value: Narrow band with a scrolling leaf and flower design. Edged at top with a row of flower sprigs. Cutwork is embellished with embroidered outline of red, green, and dark yellow. Loops of metallic thread decorate edges and spaces between motifs.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen, silk, metallic thread Technique: cutwork, embroidered

label: Provenance
value: Ex-collection: Marian Hague; Bessel Rieve Collection.

label: Description
value: Band with flowers and scrolls, with an edging of pendant flowers. Created by cut-fabric work on natural-colored linen, with picot edgings and details added in gold metallic threads. Edges secured by buttonhole stitch which holds a metallic cord which is looped at regular intervals

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen (plain weave and undyed), silk, metallic Technique: cutwork with needle-lace fillings

label: Description
value: Cut fabric with needlemade fillings, embroidery, withdrawn element work. Motif is a curving vine with leaves; one palmette contains a standing figure while another has a lion.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: embroidered with cutwork and needle lace fillings on plain weave

label: Description
value: Early Islamic embroidery fragment. Silk on linen showing multicolored fish, pairs of birds and other animals embroidered with dark outline. Allover designs of scrolls and palmettes. Scattered geometric ornament in blue. Upper border of geometric scrolls outlined in dark brown. Backed with linen. Large areas of loss and fading.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk on linen Technique: embroidered on plain weave

label: Description
value: Wide scrolling floral center with a smaler scrolling band at the top and bottom.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cut-fabric work with needle lace fillings

label: Description
value: Woven linen band with all white design of a twisting geometric floral vine with embroidered details.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with deflected element work

label: Description
value: Woven linen band fragment with design showing a heraldic shield at center, crude mermaids, standing figures holding lutes, and columns.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with deflected element work

label: Description
value: Woven linen fragment showing an allover pattern of large and small diamond shapes in withdrawn element work and embroidery on plain weave.

value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with withdrawn element work, needlework filling stitches

label: Description
value: Woven linen fragment with withdrawn element work and embroidery showing a diamond lattic design, and bobbin lace on one edge.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with withdrawn element work, needlework filling stitches, bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Square with bobbin lace edging has cross-shapes filled with needle lace fillings. These are inside a fine diamond lattice with small squares where lines intersect.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with needle lace, reticella style, and edge of bobbin lace

label: Description
value: Fragment of a woven linen border with pointed tabs on one edge. Geometric design has rectangular quadrants decorated with embroidery and small squares with needlemade filling stitches.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with withdrawn element work

label: Description
value: Woven linen band showing design of interconnected diamonds with narrow borders on top and bottom. Each diamond has five small squares filled with tiny needlemade filling stitches.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave embroidered with deflected element work, needlemade filling stitches

label: Description
value: Linen border fragment with silk embroidery and withdrawn elements showing two wide serpentine lines that form diamonds. Both lines have needlemade filling stitches and embroidered decoration. Each diamond is filled with two small rectangles that are embellished with needle made filling stitches. Remaining surface area is decorated with geometric embroidery in blue, pink, yellow and white.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen, silk Technique: plain weave embroidered with cutwork

label: Description
value: Small cover with broad sawtooth edges decorated with white linen embroidery, tassels and fringe.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork with embroidery

label: Description
value: Small pouch with an embroidered flap showing a design of diagonal grape vines.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: plain weave with embroidery and deflected element

label: Description
value: Towel end of float-patterned linen has narrow bands of geometric patterning made with needlemade filling stitches. Towel is finished with a fringe of fine macramé.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: linen Technique: knotting (macramé), withdrawn element work, needlemade filling stitches

label: Provenance
value: Pre-1971: Marian Hague collection; 1935-36: gift of Frances Morris.

label: Description
value: Woven linen towel with three rows of rectangles separated by a sawtooth lines on each end. Rectangles have needlemade filling stitches with birds, flowers and possibly a vase motif. Short fringe on each end.

value: Woven linen pillow cover showing an allover diamond pattern with dark yellow and blue embroidery.

value: Cutwork pillow cover with squares containing an alternate arrangment of birds and geometric flowers.

value: Fragment of a border has an intertwined floral vine pattern of fine white linen held with connecting bars.

value: Medium: linen Technique: cutwork with six bobbins used for connecting bars; the bobbin-made relief decoration with loops was made separately and sewn on using a needle
